trails.name: Acequia Real Route - Llano de las Perdices
trails.description: A circular peri-urban route that combines nature, panoramic views over Granada, and Nasrid hydraulic remains: the Acequia Real, tunnels, a sundial, and the Llano de la Perdiz. Ideal for a half-day trip near the city.

trails.name: Los Cahorros Route
trails.description: A spectacular route that combines hanging bridges, waterfalls, and narrow gorges. Ideal for a half-day adventure. Not suitable for people with a fear of heights.
